title: Clark County teen accidentally shot in chest
content:
A Clark County teen was accidentally shot in the chest Saturday, the Clark County Sheriff’s office announced in a press release Monday.
The 17-year-old male was shot at a home in the 3300 block of Laura Lane in Mad River Twp. just before 7 p.m. and taken to the Springfield Regional Medical Center for treatment, according to the press release. The hospital then alerted the sheriff’s office to investigate the shooting.
Sheriff’s investigators determined that an unnamed 19-year-old who thought the gun was unloaded ‘dry fired’ the weapon and struck the 17-year-old in the chest.
The victim was treated at and then transferred to Miami Valley Hospital where he was listed in stable condition.
